excellent.title: Excellent air quality for outdoor activities
excellent.description: Perfect conditions for all PE classes and outdoor activities. Students can participate fully without restrictions.

moderate.title: Moderate air quality - proceed with care
moderate.description: Most activities can proceed normally. Monitor sensitive students and consider shorter outdoor sessions for high-intensity activities.

poor.title: Poor air quality - move activities indoors
poor.description: Outdoor activities are not recommended, especially for sensitive groups. Relocate all PE classes and extracurriculars indoors.
